item.title: Try Internet Fax For Free
item.description: Even though constantly texting is the norm today, fax machines are still important, especially in business, where they’re used for contracts and other key documents. But that doesn’t mean you need a bunch of fax machines in your office. You can send and receive faxes online, wherever you are, with the right fax plan. Instead of a clunky fax machine, a fax service plan is much more practical. Fax machines can only send faxes and take up space, while a fax service plan lets you send and receive faxes digitally through email and an online account, using your computer or laptop.
